languages.text: {n}Друкари словно наэлектризован — его руки дрожат от возбуждения, а одно плечо слегка подергивается. Тем не менее на лице Маражая застыла гримаса гнева.{/n} "Никогда не вставай между мной и добычей, {name}. Ты принял{mf||а} мое предложение только для того, чтобы испортить мне финал? Тогда забудь обо всем, про что я тебе говорил. Я не намерен более потакать твоим мон-кайским слабостям".

{n}It is as if Marazhai has been electrified — his hands are trembling with exhilaration and one shoulder is twitching slightly — but a furious scowl is nevertheless fixed on his face.{/n} "Never come between me and my prey, {name}. Did you accept my offer only to spoil my finish? Then forget everything I told you. I have no intention of indulging your mon-keigh weaknesses any longer."
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари словно наэлектризован — его руки дрожат от возбуждения, а одно плечо слегка подергивается. Тем не менее на лице Маражая застыла гримаса гнева.{/n} "Никогда не вставай между мной и добычей, {name}. Ты принял{mf||а} мое предложение только для того, чтобы испортить мне финал? Тогда забудь обо всем, про что я тебе говорил. Я не намерен более потакать твоим мон-кайским слабостям".

Did you accept my offer only to spoil my finish? Then forget everything I told you. I have no intention of indulging your mon-keigh weaknesses any longer."

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋仿佛遭到电击一样。他的双手兴奋地颤抖着，一只肩膀也在微微抽搐，但依然满脸怒容。{/n}“永远不要挡在我和我的猎物之间，{name}。莫非你当初接受我的提议，只是为了毁了我这场狩猎吗？既然如此，那就忘记我对你说过的一切吧，我已经无意继续纵容你这只软弱的猴子了。”
languages.original_text: {n}It is as if Marazhai has been electrified — his hands are trembling with exhilaration and one shoulder is twitching slightly — but a furious scowl is nevertheless fixed on his face.{/n} "Never come between me and my prey, {name}. Did you accept my offer only to spoil my finish? Then forget everything I told you. I have no intention of indulging your mon-keigh weaknesses any longer."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋仿佛遭到电击一样。他的双手兴奋地颤抖着，一只肩膀也在微微抽搐，但依然满脸怒容。{/n}“永远不要挡在我和我的猎物之间，{name}。莫非你当初接受我的提议，只是为了毁了我这场狩猎吗？既然如此，那就忘记我对你说过的一切吧，我已经无意继续纵容你这只软弱的猴子了。”

languages.text: {n}マラズハイはまるで感電したかのようだった…手は興奮で震えており、片方の肩がわずかにピクピクしている。それにもかかわらず、その顔は不満で激しく歪んでいる。{/n}「何があっても俺と獲物の間に割り込むなよ、{name}。トドメの時を台無しにするつもりで俺の誘いを受けたのか？それならば、俺が言ったことはすべて忘れろ。これ以上、モン＝ケイの弱さを大目に見てやるつもりはない」
languages.original_text: {n}It is as if Marazhai has been electrified — his hands are trembling with exhilaration and one shoulder is twitching slightly — but a furious scowl is nevertheless fixed on his face.{/n} "Never come between me and my prey, {name}. Did you accept my offer only to spoil my finish? Then forget everything I told you. I have no intention of indulging your mon-keigh weaknesses any longer."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイはまるで感電したかのようだった…手は興奮で震えており、片方の肩がわずかにピクピクしている。それにもかかわらず、その顔は不満で激しく歪んでいる。{/n}「何があっても俺と獲物の間に割り込むなよ、{name}。トドメの時を台無しにするつもりで俺の誘いを受けたのか？それならば、俺が言ったことはすべて忘れろ。これ以上、モン＝ケイの弱さを大目に見てやるつもりはない」

languages.text: {n}Es como si Marazhai hubiera recibido una descarga eléctrica. Sus manos tiemblan por la emoción y uno de sus hombros se contrae de forma involuntaria, pero a pesar de eso te dirige una mirada furiosa.{/n} «Jamás te interpongas entre mi pesa y yo, {name}. ¿Habías aceptado mi oferta solo para estropearme el final? En ese caso, olvida todo lo que te he dicho. No pienso tolerar más tus remilgos de mon-keigh más».
languages.original_text: {n}It is as if Marazhai has been electrified — his hands are trembling with exhilaration and one shoulder is twitching slightly — but a furious scowl is nevertheless fixed on his face.{/n} "Never come between me and my prey, {name}. Did you accept my offer only to spoil my finish? Then forget everything I told you. I have no intention of indulging your mon-keigh weaknesses any longer."

traits.locale_text: {n}Es como si Marazhai hubiera recibido una descarga eléctrica. Sus manos tiemblan por la emoción y uno de sus hombros se contrae de forma involuntaria, pero a pesar de eso te dirige una mirada furiosa.{/n} «Jamás te interpongas entre mi pesa y yo, {name}. ¿Habías aceptado mi oferta solo para estropearme el final? En ese caso, olvida todo lo que te he dicho. No pienso tolerar más tus remilgos de mon-keigh más».

languages.text: {n}Pour un peu, on pourrait croire que Marazhai vient de subir un électrochoc : ses mains tremblent d'excitation contenue et l'une de ses épaules est agitée de soubresauts, ce qui ne l'empêche pas de vous foudroyer du regard.{/n} « Ne vous interposez pas entre ma proie et moi, {name}. Avez-vous accepté mon offre dans le seul but de gâcher mon grand final ? Si tel est le cas, oubliez tout ce que je vous ai dit. Je ne tolérerai pas une seconde de plus vos faiblesses de mon-keigh. »
languages.original_text: {n}It is as if Marazhai has been electrified — his hands are trembling with exhilaration and one shoulder is twitching slightly — but a furious scowl is nevertheless fixed on his face.{/n} "Never come between me and my prey, {name}. Did you accept my offer only to spoil my finish? Then forget everything I told you. I have no intention of indulging your mon-keigh weaknesses any longer."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pour un peu, on pourrait croire que Marazhai vient de subir un électrochoc : ses mains tremblent d'excitation contenue et l'une de ses épaules est agitée de soubresauts, ce qui ne l'empêche pas de vous foudroyer du regard.{/n} « Ne vous interposez pas entre ma proie et moi, {name}. Avez-vous accepté mon offre dans le seul but de gâcher mon grand final ? Si tel est le cas, oubliez tout ce que je vous ai dit. Je ne tolérerai pas une seconde de plus vos faiblesses de mon-keigh. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai wirkt wie unter Strom – seine Hände zittern vor Hochgefühl und eine Schulter zuckt leicht vor sich hin – und dennoch hat er Wut im Blick.{/n} "Stellt Euch niemals zwischen mich und meine Beute, {name}. Habt Ihr nur meinem Angebot zugestimmt, um mir meinen glorreichen Höhepunkt zu verderben? Dann vergesst alles, was ich Euch gesagt habe. Denn ich werde Euch schwächlichen Chem-Pan-Sey nicht weiter unterhalten."
languages.original_text: {n}It is as if Marazhai has been electrified — his hands are trembling with exhilaration and one shoulder is twitching slightly — but a furious scowl is nevertheless fixed on his face.{/n} "Never come between me and my prey, {name}. Did you accept my offer only to spoil my finish? Then forget everything I told you. I have no intention of indulging your mon-keigh weaknesses any longer."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai wirkt wie unter Strom – seine Hände zittern vor Hochgefühl und eine Schulter zuckt leicht vor sich hin – und dennoch hat er Wut im Blick.{/n} "Stellt Euch niemals zwischen mich und meine Beute, {name}. Habt Ihr nur meinem Angebot zugestimmt, um mir meinen glorreichen Höhepunkt zu verderben? Dann vergesst alles, was ich Euch gesagt habe. Denn ich werde Euch schwächlichen Chem-Pan-Sey nicht weiter unterhalten."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın elleri, âdeta elektriğe tutulmuşçasına neşeyle titriyor. Tek omzuysa hafifçe seğiriyor. Yine de yüzüne öfkeli bir somurtma yerleşmiş hâlde.{/n} "Asla avımla arama girme {name}. Teklifimi sırf sonunda keyfimi kaçırmak için mi kabul ettin? O hâlde sana söylediğim her şeyi unut. Artık mon-keigh zayıflıklarına boyun eğmek gibi bir niyetim yok."
languages.original_text: {n}It is as if Marazhai has been electrified — his hands are trembling with exhilaration and one shoulder is twitching slightly — but a furious scowl is nevertheless fixed on his face.{/n} "Never come between me and my prey, {name}. Did you accept my offer only to spoil my finish? Then forget everything I told you. I have no intention of indulging your mon-keigh weaknesses any longer."
